1.title: Total Systems Capacity

2.title: Host Capacity Mapping

6.title: Total Capacity Savings

13.query:
timeseries { used_capacity = avg(si.tenant.block.table.used_capacity), available_capacity = avg(si.tenant.block.table.available_capacity), mapped_capacity = avg(si.tenant.block.table.mapped_capacity), unmapped_capacity = avg(si.tenant.block.table.unmapped_capacity), data_reduction_savings = avg(si.tenant.block.table.data_reduction_savings), provisioned_capacity = avg(si.tenant.block.table.provisioned_capacity), capacity_savings = avg(si.tenant.block.table.capacity_savings)}, by: { name, system_id, condition, model, serial_number, type }
| fieldsAdd used_capacity = if(arrayLast(used_capacity) == -1, then: "No Data", else: arrayLast(used_capacity))
| fieldsAdd available_capacity = if(arrayLast(available_capacity) == -1, then: "No Data", else: arrayLast(available_capacity))
| fieldsAdd mapped_capacity = if(arrayLast(mapped_capacity) == -1, then: "No Data", else: arrayLast(mapped_capacity))
| fieldsAdd unmapped_capacity = if(arrayLast(unmapped_capacity) == -1, then: "No Data", else: arrayLast(unmapped_capacity))
| fieldsAdd data_reduction_savings = if(arrayLast(data_reduction_savings) == -1, then: "No Data", else: arrayLast(data_reduction_savings))
| fieldsAdd provisioned_capacity = if(arrayLast(provisioned_capacity) == -1, then: "No Data", else: arrayLast(provisioned_capacity))
| fieldsAdd capacity_savings = if(arrayLast(capacity_savings) == -1, then: "No Data", else: arrayLast(capacity_savings))

15.query:
/*
Warning:
 - DQL does not support total value mode, the resulting value may diverge from the result from classic metrics.
*/
timeseries {volumes_count = avg(si.tenant.block.table.volumes_count), pool_count = avg(si.tenant.block.table.pool_count), Mdisks_count = avg(si.tenant.block.table.Mdisks_count), drives_count = avg(si.tenant.block.table.drives_count), fc_port_count = avg(si.tenant.block.table.fc_port_count), ip_ports_count = avg(si.tenant.block.table.ip_ports_count)}, by: { name, system_id}
| fieldsAdd volumes_count = arrayAvg(volumes_count)
| fieldsAdd pool_count = arrayAvg(pool_count)
| fieldsAdd Mdisks_count = arrayAvg(Mdisks_count)
| fieldsAdd drives_count = arrayAvg(drives_count)
| fieldsAdd fc_port_count = arrayAvg(fc_port_count)
| fieldsAdd ip_ports_count = arrayAvg(ip_ports_count)

28.query:
/*
Warning:
 - DQL does not support total value mode, the resulting value may diverge from the result from classic metrics.
*/
timeseries occurences = avg(si.tenant.block.alert.table.critical.occurences), by: { alert_id, resources, alert_name, condition, violation, severity, resource_type, category, occurence_time_utc, system, alert_source }
| fieldsAdd occurences = arrayAvg(occurences)
| sort occurence_time_utc desc
